Code generated by the Protocol Buffer compiler is owned by the owner of the input file used when generating it. This code is not standalone and requires a support library to be linked with it. This support library is itself covered by the above license.

1. Definitions.
License shall mean the terms and conditions for use, reproduction, and distribution as defined by Sections 1 through 9 of this document.
Licensor shall mean the copyright owner or entity authorized by the copyright owner that is granting the License.
Legal Entity shall mean the union of the acting entity and all other entities that control, are controlled by, or are under common control with that entity. For the purposes of this definition, control means (i) the power, direct or indirect, to cause the direction or management of such entity, whether by contract or otherwise, or (ii) ownership of fifty percent (50%) or more of the outstanding shares, or (iii) beneficial ownership of such entity.
You (or Your) shall mean an individual or Legal Entity exercising permissions granted by this License.
Source form shall mean the preferred form for making modifications,including but not limited to software source code, documentation source, and configuration files.
Object form shall mean any form resulting from mechanical transformation or translation of a Source form, including but not limited to compiled object code, generated documentation, and conversions to other media types.
Work shall mean the work of authorship, whether in Source or Object form, made available under the License, as indicated by a copyright notice that is included in or attached to the work (an example is provided in the Appendix below).
Derivative Works shall mean any work, whether in Source or Object form, that is based on (or derived from) the Work and for which the editorial revisions, annotations, elaborations, or other modifications represent, as a whole, an original work of authorship. For the purposes of this License, Derivative Works shall not include works that remain separable from, or merely link (or bind by name) to the interfaces of, the Work and Derivative Works thereof.
Contribution shall mean any work of authorship, including the original version of the Work and any modifications or additions to that Work or Derivative Works thereof, that is intentionally submitted to Licensor for inclusion in the Work by the copyright owner or by an individual or Legal Entity authorized to submit on behalf of the copyright owner. For the purposes of this definition, submitted means any form of electronic, verbal, or written communication sent to the Licensor or its representatives, including but not limited to communication on electronic mailing lists, source code control systems, and issue tracking systems that are managed by, or on behalf of, the Licensor for the purpose of discussing and improving the Work, but excluding communication that is conspicuously marked or otherwise designated in writing by the copyright owner as Not a Contribution.

An active Internet connection is required. Check your network settings and try again.
A new version of Norton Mobile Security has been released. Click OK to download and install it.
May affect scan time and device performance.
Norton Security has discovered a malicious file and will help you remove it.
Scheduled scan is postponed to save power.
Your settings changes will take effect on your next scan.
Another scan is running, cancel scheduled scan.
Activate now to protect your device.
"Remote Lock only Full version adds remote locate, wipe and scream."
"Remote Lock, Locate, Wipe and Scream. Available with Full version."
"Protects you from fraudulent websites. Available with Full version."
"You can backup and restore your contacts. Available with Full version."

A new version of Norton Mobile Security has been downloaded, but cannot be installed because your device blocks applications from unknown sources. To install the new version, change the setting to allow these applications. After installation, be sure to block unknown sources again.
A new version of Norton Mobile Security providing enhanced protection for your device has been downloaded. Do you want to install it?
LiveUpdate finished: All components are up to date.
LiveUpdate canceled: Could not connect to the LiveUpdate server.
LiveUpdate off because network is roaming.
LiveUpdate failed: network timeout or no network available.
No update needed: %1$s is already the latest version.
Could not install an update for downloading error.
Norton License Agreement and Terms of Use
Fight against digital cybercrime, automatically forward security information to Symantec
I want to join Norton Community Watch in the fight against cybercrime by letting my device automatically forward security information to Symantec (Recommended).
You have another version of Norton Mobile Security that you must uninstall to avoid system conflicts with this version.
A version of Norton Mobile Security is already installed on your device. Please click Uninstall to remove this version.

"(Web Protection needs a stable network connection to work effectively)
You can continue to a blocked site if you think that the site is safe. The site will be unblocked for 30 minutes.
"
To support Opera and Firefox, tap Set Up, then find App Advisor by Norton, and turn it ON.
Turn on Web Protection to block fraudulent sites on Android browsers, Chrome and Chrome Beta.
Turn on Web Protection to block fraudulent sites on Android browsers, Chrome, Chrome Beta, Opera and Firefox.
" Redirect "
Network connection error. Please check your data connection settings.
Authentication failed. Please make sure your device time is correct.

This device is equipped with Norton Mobile Security, please return it to its legitimate owner. If you continue to use this device, you consent that it will collect your location and/or images of you and transmit it to Symantec Corp. in the US.
An unknown error has occurred. Please try again later.
Network connection error. Please check your data connection settings.
Network connection error. Please try again later.
Server certificate time mismatch: please make sure your device time is correct.
Certificate cannot be validated on your device. Please make sure your device time is correct.
"Location service is off "Tap here to fix
Adds a level of protection for your device
Prevents uninstall of Norton Mobile Security
Wipes your device after 10 failed unlock attempts
Locks the device if SIM card is removed or changed
Activate Norton Mobile Security as your Device Administrator and make it even harder for malicious apps to bypass your lock screen or uninstall the security on your device.
Using SMS or on the Web, you can:
Device locked because you have recently changed your SIM card.
Device is locked by SMS command.
If you do not remember the password, you can unlock your device at %s
Your system lock password has been changed by Norton Mobile Security. Do you want to reset it?
Not enough space on server for backup
The backup size is more than 20MB, Wifi is needed
Your contact data has not changed since the last backup. Are you sure you want to run backup?
Device does not have any contacts
Are you sure you want to delete the selected backup files?
Scheduled backup is postponed to save power.
Scheduled backup is postponed because device is active.
Scheduled backup is postponed because service is not initialized.
Scheduled backup is postponed because restore task is running.
Scheduled backup is postponed because backup task is running.
Scheduled backup is postponed because WiFi is not connected.
Scheduled backup is postponed because device is roaming.
Scheduled backup is postponed because the Internet cannot be reached.
Scheduled backup is postponed because your connection has timed out.
Scheduled backup is postponed because there is an issue with the server.
No contacts updated, scheduled backup is skipped
Your product has expired, backup failed.
Not enough space on server for backup. You can free space by deleting unneeded backups.
All local contacts will be rewritten.
Backup name should be no more than 30 chars.
You have a resumable restoration task.
To restore contacts to this device, first select a device and then a backup version to restore from.
You need to upgrade Norton Mobile Security to the latest version to restore this backup.
Selected backup file does not exist any more on server.
Are you sure you want to clean your Block History?
The numbers will be added to your block list. Do you also want to remove them from your contacts list?
The number will be added to your block list. Do you also want to remove it from your contacts list?
The number is already in your block list.
Please choose block call or SMS.
Tap \"+\" to enter the name and number of anyone whose calls or texts you want to block.
The incoming call %s is in block list.
Unable to wipe the SD card
Command blocked because sender is in block list.
The target device is already locked.
"Device locked because SIM card can't be detected."
Device locked because SIM card is missing.
Device locked because SIM card has been changed.
You have exceeded the number of login tries allowed. Security wipe is starting now.
Incorrect password! Please type it again. You have %1$s tries left.
Incorrect password! Please type it again. You have 1 try left.
We have successfully transferred your license and personal data from previous version of Norton Mobile Security. You must uninstall that previous version to avoid system conflicts.

We cannot upgrade your current version of Norton Mobile Security to the most recent version. Click Upgrade to upgrade your current version to an interim version, and then upgrade to the latest version.
Could not get your N360E license info, please retry later.
Data transfer error while migrating data from the previous version of Norton Mobile Security. Please try again.
Automatically scans apps before you install them
The current network is not WiFi. Are you sure you want to run LiveUpdate?
Scheduled LiveUpdate is currently running. Try again later.
Anti-Malware protects you from mobile threats by scanning for and removing malicious apps.
Get warnings about apps installed on your device with issues like personal information leaks, ads, data transfer and excessive battery consumption.
Just enable App Advisor for Google Play in Settings to see this information before you download an app.
Call & SMS Blocking helps guard your privacy from unwanted calls and texts.
LiveUpdate keeps your mobile protection current by automatically checking for new threat definitions and new Norton components.

"If your device is lost or stolen, you have several options for recovering it using text commands or commands from the Norton Mobile Security Website.
Using texts, you can lock, wipe, and locate your device and you can cause it to make noise. The text message should consist of an action word (lock, wipe, locate, or scream) followed by your passcode."

"If your device is lost or stolen, your device administrator can do the following:
- Remotely lock, wipe, and locate your device - Cause the device to make a noise - Trigger the device's camera to take a picture of whatever is in front of it"
On the website, you can also lock and locate your device. In addition, you can trigger your device’s camera to take a picture of whoever or whatever is in front of it to help you retrieve it.
Additional Anti-Theft options are available in Settings.
Web Protection detects and warns you about fraudulent websites before you visit them.

"We recommend that you turn on Security Lock for Norton Mobile Security to keep your device protected in case it is started in Safe Mode. To turn on Security Lock:
1. On the Norton Mobile Security main screen, tap Menu. 2. On the Menu screen, tap Settings. 3. On the Settings screen, tap Security Lock.
Please note that Security Lock will need to be turned off in order to uninstall Norton Mobile Security."
Postpones scheduled LiveUpdate or scans when the battery is low until the battery is charged.

"Securely back up the contacts on your device online and restore them to this device or any other device that also has Norton Mobile Security installed. When you restore a backup, you have two choices: Append or Overwrite. Append adds the contacts you don't already have on your device. Overwrite replaces your current contact list with the backed up list."
No application handling share action is found.

"Hi. I'm using Norton Mobile Security to protect my mobile device from malware and theft. It has features like anti-malware, App Advisor, Web protection, call and SMS blocking (for phones), backup and restore of contacts, and anti-theft. So you can protect your device and the important stuff on it, try it here: "
Public key exists, no need to update.
Public key is set by command.
Remote Locate is off because GPS is off.
Now that you have had a chance to use Norton Mobile Security, would you like to rate it on Google Play?
Norton Mobile Security cannot protect this device from the SD card. Please install the product on the device’s internal memory.
Your purchase from Google was successful, but is not yet registered with Symantec. Please click Register to complete your upgrade.
Upgrade to full version to add:
Sign in to access the following features:
Activate to access the following features:
Synchronize license to get the following features back:
SMS Lock, Scream, Wipe, and Locate
Web Lock, Scream, Wipe, Locate, and Sneak Peek
I have already purchased the product
Google in-app billing is running, please wait.
Purchase could not be completed. Please try again.
Unable to register your purchase right now. Please try again later.
Skip trial and purchase premium today
Learn more about how to get a Norton One membership at one.norton.com.
Your copy of Norton Mobile Security is part of a multi-platform offering. Go to manage.norton.com to renew your subscription.
License server connection error. Please try again later.
Another license synchronization task is already running.
You must uninstall Norton Anti-Theft in order to avoid any application conflicts with Norton Mobile Security. Click Uninstall below to remove Norton Anti-Theft.

"Because Norton Anti-Theft is already installed on this device, the Anti-Theft feature of Norton Mobile Security Lite will be turned off. We recommend that you upgrade to the full version of Norton Mobile Security for more comprehensive Anti-Theft protection."
Auto login failed. Please enter your Norton account and Password manually.
With this passcode, you can use SMS commands to:
Wipe your data from your device
Find out more or change your passcode at %s
Norton Mobile Security is switched off
Get the latest version and stay protected.
Get the latest version of Norton Mobile Security.
Get the latest version of the app and stay protected.
This is a known malicious website. It is recommended that you do NOT visit this site.
This site is a known malicious website. We recommend that you close the tab without visiting the site.
For better protection of your browser, JavaScript must be enabled.
Please enable JavaScript otherwise we can not protect you.
For better protection of your browser:
DO NOT go back to previous web page.
Are you sure you want to exit?
To display this page, we must send information that will repeat any action (such as a search or order confirmation) that was performed earlier. Do you want to continue?
Please make sure your device time is correct. Otherwise, you have attempted to reach a site whose security certificate is not trusted by the operating system on your device!
A problem occurred while trying to communicate with the server. Please check your network settings. Do you want to retry now?
Incorrect account. Please use the account associated with this product.
Norton Mobile Security has been disabled on this device by the user.
The activation key has been refunded.
Cannot connect to the server. Please check your network settings or try again later.
Device date/time does not match with server.
You either have not set up a Google account or Google in-app billing is not available in your country.
Purchase cannot be completed due to a program error.
The billing service is unavailable. Please check your network connection, make sure it is correct.
Unable to communicate with Google Play Store service. Please try again later.
Error! Google Play is not found!
You need to update your version of Android Market to 2.3.4 (or higher).
You need to update your version of Android Market to 5.0.12 (or higher).
Your version of Android does not support in-app purchases. Please update your Android operating system to a newer version.
Unable to establish communication with Google Play Store service. Please restart your device and try again.
Please enable \"Background data\" sync in \"Settings\" -> \"Accounts and sync\" before purchase.
An unexpected Google server error. Please try again later.
An unexpected error has occurred. Please restart your device and try again.
An unexpected Symantec server error. Please try again later.
An internal error has occurred. Please restart your device and try again.

This device is equipped with Norton Mobile Security. If you continue to use this device, you consent that it will collect your location and/or images of you and send them to Symantec Corporation in the US where they will be retained until the owner requests deletion. Up to 10 images/locations will be retained and provided to the owner, who registered with Symantec for the purposes of tracking this device.
Please accept the updated EULA and Terms of Service.
Get added protection for your device with Norton Mobile Security Premium FREE for %1$d days.
You will be losing a lot of valuable features

"• App Advisor - warns about bad apps • Contacts backup - you can access your contacts anywhere • Web Protection - safe browsing ensures your privacy is protected • Call Blocking - blocks unwanted calls and texts."
You have not run backup for 7 days.
These apps have issues you should review. Tap an app for more info.
These apps you have trusted even though they have issues.
The following features are no longer available:
Malware is dangerous and should be removed.
Malware scan now runs automatically so your device is always protected.
App Advisor can tell you about apps containing other risks, such as information leaks.
Get more info about your apps with our new premium App Advisor. Try all the premium features FREE for %d days.
Did you know? App Advisor in Norton Mobile Security Premium can tell you about apps containing other risks, such as information leaks.

"Do you want to remove this malware file on storage?
%s?"

"Norton Mobile Security detects malware and our new App Advisor tells you if any apps are collecting private information, contain adware, or are draining your battery or sending data when you're not using the app.
Now users can try out all the features "FREE for 30 days just by creating an account. After that, you can upgrade to a premium account or keep Norton Mobile Security Lite with Malware Scan.

string.name: whats_new_text
string.b: New in this version of Norton Mobile Security:

resources.string: An App Advisor feature that detects:
Collection or sharing of personal data
Scan is now accessible from the menu list.
Scheduled Scan and LiveUpdate is now accessible from the Settings menu.
Check your Internet connection and try again later.
Cannot connect to the server. Try again later.
"We don't have any info about this app yet. Check back soon."
The shared data does not contain a link to an app.
Only shared data from Google Play App is currently supported.
Please ensure you have properly activated Norton Mobile Security before using.
To see App Advisor information on apps before you download them, you need to install the latest version of Google Play.
Collects and sends phone number. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends SIM card details, including address book, mobile PIN, and call history. This can add charges to data plan and is a MED privacy risk.
Collects and sends personal account details, including account user names and passwords. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends recorded audio clips. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends calendar event details. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends call log details, including date, duration, and phone numbers. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends pictures. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends address book details. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends SMS messages. This can add charges to data plan and is a HIGH privacy risk.
Collects and sends your location info. This can add charges to data plan and is a LOW privacy risk.
Collects and sends mobile network details, including operator name, country, and MNC/MCC. This can add charges to data plan and is a LOW privacy risk.
Collects and sends device info, including brand, model, OS, IMEI number. This can add charges to data plan and is a LOW privacy risk.
Collects and sends list of installed apps and app details. This can add charges to data plan and is a LOW privacy risk.
Collects and sends list of apps running at a specific time. This can add charges to data plan and is a MED privacy risk.
Collects and sends browser history. This can add charges to data plan and is a MED privacy risk.
Collects and sends browser bookmarks. This can add charges to data plan and is a MED privacy risk.
Collects and sends device settings info, including ringer, Bluetooth, and sleep settings. This can add charges to data plan and is a LOW privacy risk.
No ad networks found in this app, but may contain ads embedded in content.
Sends an SMS when clicking ads.
Displays ads while in use, including banners, pop-ups, and other graphics. These ads are common in free apps.
Only uses battery when app is in use.
Only uses mobile data when app is in use.
Automatically updates itself with new features.
Prompts you to install other apps. Apps cannot be installed without your permission, but prompt can be intrusive. This is a HIGH privacy risk.
Automatically updates itself with new features without your permission. Updates may not be malicious and could be part of normal app function. This is a HIGH privacy risk.
Changes your browser home screen. This is a HIGH privacy risk.

"App Advisor automatically scans apps in Google Play before you install them, looking for risky or annoying behavior. Web Protection protects you from entering fraudulent websites.
Both features require your permission to observe your actions and retrieve app content and website addresses, all of which is used for the sole purpose of feature functionality. This information is never stored or shared.
Turn on this setting to allow App Advisor and Web Protection to function."
Find and tap on App Advisor by Norton
Sorry, we did not find Accessibility Settings on your device.
App Advisor automatically scans Google Play apps before you install them.
Tap Set Up" and find "App Advisor by Norton.
You can set up later in Settings

"Open Google Play and tap any app.
App Advisor will automatically scan that app and display the results."
Tap any app. App Advisor will automatically scan that app and display the results.
Have you installed Google Play Store?
Set up now for proactive protection.
Disable App Advisor for Google Play
Your device has issues running App Advisor for Google Play. To help maintain performance, tap Disable to open the Accessibility page, find App Advisor by Norton, and turn it OFF.

"Sign up for a Norton account and try all Premium features FREE for 30 days, including: \u0009\u0009• App Advisor \u0009\u0009• Backup \u0009\u0009• Web Protection \u0009\u0009• Call and SMS blocking Then upgrade to a Premium account or keep using the free Norton Mobile Security including Anti-Malware scan."
App Advisor automatically scans the app and shows the results.
Open Google Play and tap any app.
You can activate later in Settings.
